first time playing it. Best game ever... I just finished it and i feel sad for the ending. It makes me feel, Nostalgic. overall... 10/10 experience.

This game have great story and funny moment.

Half life 2 isn't perfect but a lot of the game play can be fun to play but also tricky, especially some parts of water hazard and most of ravenholm. Half life 2 made me a big fan of these types of games, it inspired me to try making a game like half life myself, it is still under development and i like it a lot, overall i recommend this game to people who like being challenged and people who like post-apocalyptic type games

We're back, back in the city. And everything has changed.We feel, we feel disappointed. The faces remain the same. We see shadows. So sad, but our new friend makes us smile. Take us back, pretty girl, take us back. No one will know. We took to the road. Where should we go? There where time goes forward but the error can no longer be corrected. There is no room for doubt, only the will imposed by someone else. There is one more place. Time has stopped there. Every day is like the day before. But we are not alone, all our friends are here. We need to work hard, but we know that then we will have a lot of rest. And when we are asked why we have chosen this path, we will remain silent.
it is an awsome fps game

Half-Life 2 is one of the greatest shooters and best sequels ever made. It introduce new things the first game didn't have like;physics, new mechanics, vehicles, new weapons, smarter ai/npc's and mind-blowing graphics.
zombie dead, more zombie dead soon

This is the best game I have ever played, the storyline is just sooooo good. Using the Gravity Gun in Ravenholm was fun as hell. The graphics are tooo good for a game which came out in 2004. I thank my friend who introduced me to this masterpiece. just play it and u will enjoy it so much
even if this game was made in 2004, it looks visually amazing. valve never fails to disappoint
